name: Mesoamericana! (demo)
description:
Mesoamericana! is a game set in central america, in a fictional universe inspired by the pre-columbian cultures (Aztecs, Mayans, Olmecs, etc.). It tells the story of the Serpent God Quetzalcoatl, its return on the land of men and its quest to gain back the trust of his people.

In these cultures, the god Quetzalcoatl is believed to be benevolent and to have been exiled a long time ago by the Night God Tezcatlipoca, its return long awaited since then.

In this demo, you will be able to play as Quetzalcoatl and try your hands at fighting waves of enemies, each new one stronger than the last.

Please note that the final product may be very different from this demo. Your feedback will be greatly appreciated!
